com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions

Interface SessionStrategy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ObjectStoringSessionStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy, SerializableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy, SessionCookieStrategy

    public interface SessionStrategy
    Represents a strategy used to read and write information into the user's session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> findValueByKey(java.lang.String key)
      Finds the value associated with the given key in session.
      void overwriteValueByKey(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Saves the value associated with the given key in session, replacing it if it already existed.
      void removeValueByKey(java.lang.String key)
      Removes the value associated with the given key from session.

    • Method Detail

      • findValueByKey

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> findValueByKey(java.lang.String key)
        Finds the value associated with the given key in session.
        Parameters:
        key - the session key
        Returns:
        the value found in session, or empty if not found

      • overwriteValueByKey

        void overwriteValueByKey(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value)
        Saves the value associated with the given key in session, replacing it if it already existed.
        Parameters:
        key - the session key
        value - the value to be set in session

      • removeValueByKey

        void removeValueByKey(java.lang.String key)
        Removes the value associated with the given key from session.
        Parameters:
        key - the session key
